sentences.en: Bring the children back from the kindergarten at four o'clock.
sentences.cn: 下午四点把孩子们从幼儿园接回来.

sentences.en: Children graduate to the kindergarten, then pre-school, and then school.
sentences.cn: 孩子们先上幼儿园，然后上学前班，再接着上小学。

sentences.en: I to the kindergarten at the age of three.
sentences.cn: 在我记忆中，我三岁就被送去幼儿园了。

sentences.en: On Sunday, the kids of the kindergarten made a very amusing spectacle.
sentences.cn: 星期日那天, 幼儿园的孩子们作了很有意思的表演.

sentences.en: She looks after children in the kindergarten.
She packed her children off to the kindergarten early in the morning.
sentences.cn: 她早晨很早就把孩子送到幼儿园去了.

sentences.en: She took me to the kindergarten and home every day, in spite of rain and wind.
sentences.cn: 无论是下雨还是刮风，她每天带我在幼儿园和家之间穿梭。

sentences.en: The boys have been comrades since kindergarten days.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子从幼儿园时就成了好朋友.

sentences.en: The children learn singing, dancing, drawing, and the like in the kindergarten.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在幼儿园里学习唱歌、跳舞、画图画等。

sentences.en: The children's faces were brightened up when they saw their parents appear at the gate of the kindergarten.
sentences.cn: 当孩子们看到家长们出现在幼儿园门口时,都喜形于色.

sentences.en: The head of the kindergarten has such a commanding voice that everyone there obeys her.
sentences.cn: 幼儿园园长的声音十分威严,所以大家都听她的话.

sentences.en: The kid was abducted at the gate of kindergarten.
sentences.cn: 那小孩在幼儿园大门口被绑架走了.

sentences.en: There is a kindergarten behind my house.
sentences.cn: 我家后面有一所幼儿园.

sentences.en: These children hit it off well in the kindergarten.
sentences.cn: 这些小孩在幼儿园里相处得很好.

sentences.en: They ran the kindergarten extremely well.
sentences.cn: 他们把幼儿园办得很好.

sentences.en: Trina's work consisted in taking care of the kindergarten rooms.
sentences.cn: 屈丽娜的工作包括收拾幼稚园的屋子.

words.tran_cn: 幼儿园教师；幼儿园里的小孩

trans.tran_en: a school for children aged two to five
